name: Morning Announcments
short_description: Morning Announcements is an open source, cross-platform command-line program that collects info such as the current temperature, popular news stories, and the weather forecast and creates a text file that can be displayed or read by any Text-to-Speech engine. Morning Announcements was originally intended to run on the Raspberry Pi, a small Linux PC, as an alarm clock, but because the Pi is based on the ARM architecture, and Morning Announcements will be developed with REALBasic, that will not be possible.
summary: Collects info such as weather or news and creates a readable text file
